common_title: ES_Corgi: The Future of AI Language Learning

index_communicative_language_teaching: ES_* Communicative Language Teaching: State of the Art. Savignon, S. J. (1991)
index_description: ES_Experience the magic of speaking with AI, just like how children naturally learn languages.
index_discover_a_fun_and_effective_way: ES_Discover a fun and effective way to master a new language
index_download_corgi_and_discover_the_mo: ES_Download Corgi and discover the most natural way to learn a language: with your voice.
index_expand_your_word_bank: ES_Expand your word bank without breaking a sweat. Say goodbye to boring word lists and hello to a fun, interactive learning experience!
index_mistakes_no_worries: ES_Mistakes? No Worries, We’ve Got Your Back!
index_our_app_gently_corrects: ES_Our app gently corrects your slip-ups and boosts your grammar — kind of like a friendly grammar ninja.Get instant feedback on your language blunders and watch your grammar skills soar.
index_review_1_text: ES_Super good If I can give 100 stars I would give it. it is a nice app
index_review_2_text: ES_Thank you so much to a team who made this such a helpful application... thanks a lot :)
index_review_3_text: ES_Its like my best friend he is really cute
index_review_4_text: ES_Good! I use the translate button to understand, recommended!
index_review_5_text: ES_Thank you for this application i hope you add arabic language
index_review_6_text: ES_Excellent finally found what I needed 5/5
index_speak_to_learn_learn_to_speak: ES_Speak to Learn, Learn to Speak
index_studies_show_speaking_can_boost: ES_Studies show speaking can boost your learning efficiency by up to 75%*. It's the fast track to fluency!
index_the_best_time_to_start_is_now: ES_The Best Time to Start is NOW!
index_title: ES_Explore the Future of AI Language Learning
index_with_corgi_you_can_role_play: ES_With Corgi, you can role-play real-life scenarios and build confidence in your speaking skills. From ordering a coffee to navigating a new city, we’ve got you covered!

privacy_this_privacy_policy_describes: ES_This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
privacy_we_use_your_personal_data_to_pro: ES_We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

subscribe_description: ES_Sometimes we have some stunning news we want to share. Don't miss it.
why_do_you_need_account_description: ES_Well, we get it – we're not fans of signing up for stuff online either. But, alas, we had to do it to ensure your progress is saved and synced up. Without the whole registration thing, the cool features you now enjoy in Corgi wouldn't have been possible.
why_do_you_need_account_item_1_text: ES_Your data? It's like Fort Knox – we don't share it with a soul.
why_do_you_need_account_item_2_text: ES_Encryption is our middle name – all your info is under lock and key.
why_do_you_need_account_item_3_text: ES_No spam! We don't hit you with marketing messages unless you've given us the green light.
